Property.name: allowReselect
Property.comment: If set to true then reselecting a color that is already selected fires the {@link #select} event

Property.name: itemCls
Property.comment: The CSS class to apply to the containing element (defaults to 'x-color-palette')

Property.name: tpl
Property.comment: An existing XTemplate instance to be used in place of the default template for rendering the component.

Property.name: value
Property.comment: The initial color to highlight (should be a valid 6-digit color hex code without the # symbol). Note that the hex codes are case-sensitive.

Event.name: select
Event.comment: Fires when a color is selected

Param.name: color
Param.comment: The 6-digit color hex code (without the # symbol)
